content:
Q: If you are late submitting an assignment, an Assignment Extension Request must be?
A: submitted as a request through the Student HelpDesk students.dbs.ie/dashboard/sccm, along with supporting documentation such as a medical certificate, or an equivalent. This documentation should be received prior to the submission deadline. PMC/Assignment Extension requests should never be assumed to be approved until written notice has been sent to you.

metadata.source_file: FAQs from Students at Dublin Business School.pdf
metadata.question: If you are late submitting an assignment, an Assignment Extension Request must be?
